page_content: The page is about registration for instructional courses offered by the police.
The page discusses non-allowable expenses in the context of income from agricultural and forestry activities.
The page provides information on contributions to the 2nd and 3rd pillars as well as AHV/IV/EO contributions for non-employed individuals.
The page is a news article about high traffic expected due to a concert in Bern.
The page discusses advancements in E-Government within the tax administration, including the use of TaxMe-Online for electronic tax filing.
The page discusses the lifting of a general fire and fireworks ban in 6 out of 10 administrative districts in the Canton of Bern.
